author: ranket
title: On line local Area shopping by ADA
description: The use case  for non Crypto citizens is important.  For understanding Cardano worth, we have to emphasize the benefit from Cardano Project.
solution: The special discount on internet shopping by ADA supported by Catalyst will promote ADA holder shopping and active local area economy.
experience: Members already support several Catalyst fund including local government project Kittamu, which promote easy access to local are citizens.
